players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Alice was not involved in Diana's death."
Bob: "I have evidence that Alice is the mafioso. I suggest we question her further."
You: "I have an alibi for Night 1. I was in my hideout, far away from the scene of the crime."
Charlie: "I believe Charlie is trustworthy. He hasn't shown any signs of betrayal or suspicion."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
